item.title: Phone Reviews (Pixel 5a, 8a + Mystery Phone)
item.description: Update: Everything worked in hugo’s test environment, but I guess local images in sliders breaks everything for who knows why once I actually published the post. I’m just going to replace some sliders with lists of images you can click on. Before upgrading my phone I heard the Pixel 8a referred to as the “most boring phone ever,” and that seems like a good description of the phone - and something that I’m a fan of.
